price: E, nesse dia, deixá-los-emos se agitarem, undantes, uns sobre outros. E se soprará na Trombeta; então, juntá-los-emos, a todos.
arabic: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wataraknā baʿḍahum yawma-idhin yamūju fī baʿḍin wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fajamaʿnāhum jamʿan
